column4: i feel like an idiot..  but i am trying to update my Ubuntu 10.04 system with better resolution to my video driver.  but I can not seem to be able to find xorg.conf (at least not where I would expect).  it isn't at /etc/X11/xorg.conf.   and not sure what xorg is using when it boots... I am getting frustrated.
ok... everytime I create one then... it messes up... and not sure how to configure the xorg so it would boot properly?
Another thing you might try is a different display.  Some displays don't reply with their data properly or something and X sees no config data from display and defaults to minimums or something.
